unit_learning_outcomes.description: responsibly work in a team to collaboratively assess environmental problems of real life industrial emissions
collect and interpret raw data in environmentally significant terms
write clear and cogent reports, assessing environmental quality matters for management and public audiences
demonstrate modelling skills for environmental impact assessment of pollutant emissions
explain the fundamental principles of environmental pollution and impacts on health

assessments.description: The project will involve modeling and assessment of environmental impacts of industrial operations.
This assessment will consist of preparing a consulting report assessing environmental pollution data of a case study.

data.description: This unit focuses on the chemical and physical aspects of environmental pollution. The aims of the unit are to show how a number of major chemical pollutants are released into the environment, how they react, move and impact the environment and human health. The presentation is set in the context of the science and management of environmental pollution. The unit includes assessment and treatment of problems in air pollution, global atmospheric change, water pollution and environmental impact assessment.
